page.description: GenerateRTF creates an embedded QRCode image for an RTF file.
page.syntax: PUBLIC STATIC GenerateRTF AS C (text AS C, correctionLevel AS C, width AS N, height AS N)

argument.name: correctionLevel AS C
argument.description: Correction level can be L,M,Q or H (L=7%, M=15%, Q=25%, H=30%). See [QRCode Namespace] for more information.
